name: bitnoid (itch)
description:
i regret many things

at least i learned a lot about C# and unity in general

made in 7 days for the first boundless game jam

first game in unity and really just in general

i made a trailer for it but it doesnt make sense

you were supposed to be some sort of robot killing machine but uh that did not work out in-game

i thought i came up with the name but it turns out its from some mobile game i downloaded a while ago but we will not speak of it
